00020 /*
00021  * Floating point scanf/printf (input/output) definitions.
00022  */
00023 
00024 #ifdef _NO_LONGDBL
00025 /* 11-bit exponent (VAX G floating point) is 308 decimal digits */
00026 #define MAXEXP          308
00027 #else  /* !_NO_LONGDBL */
00028 /* 15-bit exponent (Intel extended floating point) is 4932 decimal digits */
00029 #define MAXEXP          4932
00030 #endif /* !_NO_LONGDBL */
00031 /* 128 bit fraction takes up 39 decimal digits; max reasonable precision */
00032 #define MAXFRACT        39
